q: release including the financials( MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.- January 20, 2011- Google Inc.( NASDAQ: GOOG) today announced financial results for the quarter and the fiscal year ended December 31, 2010. its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research.
